title: Pennant Race: Yamada Taichi no Kiseki
original_name: ペナントレース やまだたいちの奇蹟
sinopse:
Yamada Tachi joined Astros professional baseball team, which he has always admired ever since he was a kid and now he aims to achieve his childhood dream of winning the championship with them.

Included one-shot:
Volume 14: Pennant Race (pilot)
